Package index

Colour vectors and colour palettes

pal_colour() is_colour() as_colour()
Colour vectors
pal_palette() is_palette() as_palette()
Colour palettes
as_tibble(<palettes_colour>) as_tibble(<palettes_palette>)
Cast colour vectors and colour palettes to tibbles
plot(<palettes_colour>) plot(<palettes_palette>)
Plot colour vectors and colour palettes

Colour mapping and colour scales

pal_numeric() pal_bin() pal_quantile() pal_factor()
Colour vector and colour palette mapping
scale_colour_palette_d() scale_fill_palette_d() scale_colour_palette_c() scale_fill_palette_c() scale_colour_palette_b() scale_fill_palette_b()
Colour scales from colour vectors and colour palettes

Colour interpolation and colour mixing

pal_ramp()
Colour vector and colour palette interpolation
`+`(<palettes_colour>)
Mix colour vectors with arithmetic operators
sum(<palettes_colour>) cumsum(<palettes_colour>)
Mix colour vectors with math functions

Included palettes

met_palettes met_palettes_a11y
Metropolitan Museum of Art palettes
nord_palettes
Nord palettes
pnw_palettes
Pacific Northwest palettes
viridis_palettes
Viridis palettes

Miscellaneous

palettes-options
Package options
list_colour_symbols()
Symbols to use in colour previews
